title: My friend had his account hacked, then scripted on and is now banned. Is there anything they can do?
body:
My friends account 'Neoniquist' has been banned after he logged in for the first time in months. He is an obvious support main but had someone play Kog'Maw on the account since.

Quick Edit: They have changed the email but not the password.

replies.body:
What Morgana said, but to elaborate, have him submit an account recovery ticket specifically, and if possible, tell him to use a different email (one that has never been attached to the account). He should also immediately change the password for his League account (if this is still possible) and his attached email/the email he used to sign up since this could also be compromised (that may be how the intruder got his login details).

Barring any extraneous circumstances he should get his account back once ownership and security have been verified with Player Support.

And remember! A long password is better than a random one, most passwords are "guessed" by computers randomly putting letters together, so something really long like "thecowwenttothemarketandboughtsomehayfordinner" is a lot more secure,takes much longer to crack and is more memorable than "a@17Hj".

Hey! Sorry to hear about your friend and it totally sucks, head on over to https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new and open a new ticket, no one here can help you out, sorry! Good luck! Riot will try their hardest to get your friends account back in order!
